The Peaches
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher DS Archive (DS): Monster Rancher DS: General QA: The Peaches
By Aaron18637 on Tuesday, August 10, 2010 - 06:59 pm:

where can you find silver and gold peaches

By Sekundes on Tuesday, August 10, 2010 - 07:18 pm:

Silver is random errentry if I remember correctly.
Gold is Kawrea Volcano once every number of years.

Torr will also randomly offer to sell you one once in a while in addition to the rest of his stuff.

By Rahu on Tuesday, August 10, 2010 - 07:27 pm:

Back in Monster Rancher 1, I used to keep a monster frozen until I got another peach, at which point I'd thaw him out, raise him up for a few months and put him back in the freezer again until I found another peach.

Any reason this tactic wouldn't work here?

By Thorr on Wednesday, August 11, 2010 - 07:02 am:

From what I can see, you can get a golden peach every 10 years from Volk Magma erranty.

The following are one-time Golden peach awards -

1) Win the Legend Cup
2) Complete your monster book
3) Get all the Zodiac monsters
4) Get a monster to rank SSS
5) Complete Holly's 4 tournaments(not sure on translation)

Silver peaches -
1) If your monster has a very high trust in you, you can occasionally find them in Errantry.
2) Torr

By Thorr on Wednesday, August 11, 2010 - 07:07 am:

Correction to #5 on the Golden Peach list -

5) Win every tournament. (In other words, complete the tournament list in your Breeder Data.)

By Aaron18637 on Wednesday, August 11, 2010 - 07:29 am:

that is awesome where did you find this out

By Thorr on Wednesday, August 11, 2010 - 07:34 am:

Perfect Guide

By Lord Blade on Thursday, August 12, 2010 - 04:44 pm:

How many peaches can you give your monster?
And how much do they extend its lifespan?

By Thorr on Thursday, August 12, 2010 - 04:59 pm:

You can use 2 Gold or 4 Silver peaches.

Gold adds 50 weeks.
Silver adds 25 weeks.

By GM on Tuesday, August 31, 2010 - 12:18 am:

How were you able to get the Woody Dragon and Killer General, by
the way? They're the only ones I'm missing, and the kanji bug keeps
me from getting them from the shrine.

By Thorr on Wednesday, September 1, 2010 - 07:52 am:

Finishing the Zodiac Monsters means battling them all, not generating them all.

However, you would need them in order to get the full monster book peach.

Also note, I think the entry for "getting a monster to SS rank" may actually be "Get at least one of every main breed to SS rank." There is a breeder screen that shows you the highest rank you have achieved with each breed which is helpful in this endeavor.
